name: ai-call-center
description: AI Call Center with WebSocket to WebRTC communication system

scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:all
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.build:all: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.clean: npm run clean --prefix server && npm run clean --prefix client
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf server/node_modules client/node_modules node_modules
scripts.test: npm test --prefix server && npm test --prefix client
scripts.help:
